message: I propose a fair 90/10 split.  I believe this is a good starting point for a mutually beneficial outcome.
Alice, your offer was a bit too one-sided. Let's be more realistic. This split is more reflective of a fair negotiation.
I understand your desire for a more even split, Bob. I'm willing to compromise by offering 6000 for myself and 4000 for you. This is a fair offer considering the inflation we're facing.
